description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Get ready to blast your friends away in a frenzy of colorful action! Attack, defend, and just shoot your way to victory. Paint the spiked ball with your color to keep you safe, but don't let it touch your power cell when it's a different color. Earn points to unlock upgrades and powerups and make the matches more fun!
